com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BleNode.ConnectionFailListener, BleServer.ConnectionFailListener
    Enclosing class:
    BleServer

    public static class BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements BleServer.ConnectionFailListener
    Default implementation of BleServer.ConnectionFailListener that attempts a certain number of retries. An instance of this class is set by default for all new BleServer instances using DEFAULT_CONNECTION_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT. Use BleServer.setListener_ConnectionFail(ConnectionFailListener) to override the default behavior.
    See Also:
    BleServer.ConnectionFailListener, BleServer.setListener_ConnectionFail(ConnectionFailListener)

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode.ConnectionFailListener

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_CONNECTION_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT
      The default retry count provided to BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener.
      static int DEFAULT_FAIL_COUNT_BEFORE_USING_AUTOCONNECT
      The default connection fail limit past which BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener will start returning BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please.retryWithAutoConnectTrue().
      static Interval MAX_RETRY_TIME_FOR_BOND_FAILURE
      The maximum amount of time to keep trying if connection is failing due to (what usually are) transient bonding failures

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_CONNECTION_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT

        public static final int DEFAULT_CONNECTION_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT
        The default retry count provided to BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener. So if you were to call BleDevice.connect() and all connections failed, in total the library would try to connect 2+1 times.
        See Also:
        BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener, Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_FAIL_COUNT_BEFORE_USING_AUTOCONNECT

        public static final int DEFAULT_FAIL_COUNT_BEFORE_USING_AUTOCONNECT
        The default connection fail limit past which BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener will start returning BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please.retryWithAutoConnectTrue().
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_RETRY_TIME_FOR_BOND_FAILURE

        public static final Interval MAX_RETRY_TIME_FOR_BOND_FAILURE
        The maximum amount of time to keep trying if connection is failing due to (what usually are) transient bonding failures
